resource_dependency.stockDatabaseSchema: Create a database table named 'stocks' with fields: stock_id (unique ID), symbol (string), name (string), sector (string), exchange (string), current_price (float), last_updated (datetime).

function: Allow users to search for stocks by entering either stock codes or names.
static_description: A centered search bar with a navy border and white background, accompanied by a magnifying glass icon (stockSearchIcon) on the right side. Placeholder text reads 'Enter stock code or name'.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking inside the search bar focuses it and enables typing. Clicking the magnifying glass icon initiates the search.
Pressing Enter while focused on the input field triggers the search operation.

resource_dependency.realTimeStockDataAPI: An API that provides real-time stock prices and updates every minute.
resource_dependency.stockDetailsSchema: Database schema includes fields such as stock_id, symbol, name, sector, industry, market_cap, pe_ratio, dividend_yield, etc.

function: Display real-time stock information including basic stock details.
static_description: A card-style container with a navy header displaying the stock name and symbol. Below are rows showing key metrics like price, change percentage, market cap, P/E ratio, and dividend yield.

interaction_and_states.description: Hovering over any metric shows a tooltip explaining what the metric means.

resource_dependency.marketTrendChartLibrary: Integration with Chart.js or similar charting library.
resource_dependency.trendAnalysisAlgorithm: A backend algorithm that analyzes moving averages, RSI, MACD, and other indicators.

function: Visualize market trends and provide analytical tools for trend interpretation.
static_description: A line chart with time on the x-axis and price on the y-axis, rendered in navy tones. Additional tabs below show RSI, MACD, and volume charts.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on different tabs switches between various technical analysis views (e.g., RSI, MACD).
Hovering over points on the chart displays exact values and timestamps.

resource_dependency.financialDataTableSchema: Database schema containing quarterly and annual financial data such as revenue, net income, EPS, assets, liabilities, cash flow, etc.
resource_dependency.externalFinancialDataAPI: API providing access to comprehensive financial statements and filings (e.g., SEC EDGAR)

function: Present detailed financial data for selected stocks.
static_description: Tabular view with alternating row colors, showing columns for date, revenue, net income, earnings per share, total assets, and liabilities. Header is styled in navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking column headers sorts the table ascending/descending by that column’s value.

resource_dependency.customReportGeneratorEngine: Backend engine responsible for compiling user-selected content into structured reports.
resource_dependency.reportTemplateFiles: Pre-designed templates stored server-side in HTML/PDF formats.

function: Enable generation of customizable stock reports based on user-defined criteria.
static_description: Form layout with checkboxes and dropdowns allowing selection of sections (basic info, market trends, financials, news). A 'Generate Report' button in navy color sits below.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the 'Generate Report' button processes the selections and renders a preview of the custom report.

function: Let users choose their preferred report format and content options.
static_description: Two sections: one with radio buttons labeled with format options (formatOptionsList), another with checkboxes listing content choices (contentSelectionFields). Both use navy-themed styling.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting a radio button chooses a format. Checking/unchecking boxes toggles inclusion of respective content sections in the final report.

resource_dependency.professionalReportTemplate: Standardized template file ensuring consistent branding and structure across all generated reports.
resource_dependency.reportExportAPI: Service capable of exporting documents in PDF, DOCX, and HTML formats.

function: Automatically compile and format professional-quality stock reports.
static_description: Preview pane showing a formatted document with title, executive summary, and selected sections clearly laid out. Export/download buttons appear beneath the preview.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking download/export buttons generates the full report in the chosen format and prompts the browser to save it.

resource_dependency.componentStyleGuide: All UI components follow a minimalist design with white backgrounds and navy accents (#000080).

function: Maintain a clean, accessible user interface with a consistent color scheme.
static_description: Entire site uses a white background with navigation bars, buttons, and highlights in navy blue (#000080). Text remains dark gray for readability.

resource_dependency.summaryGenerationEngine: NLP-based system summarizing complex financial data into concise summaries.
resource_dependency.summaryDataSchema: Database storing pre-generated summaries linked to stock_id and timestamp.

function: Generate brief but informative summaries of stock performance and outlook.
static_description: Text block titled 'Stock Summary', featuring a short paragraph synthesizing recent performance, market sentiment, and analyst outlook in navy-colored text.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking a 'Refresh Summary' button regenerates the summary using latest available data.

resource_dependency.historicalPriceDataAPI: An API returning daily/hourly historical stock prices going back several years.

function: Visualize historical price movements through interactive charts.
static_description: Interactive line chart with a dropdown selector above it offering time range options (timeRangeSelectorValues). Chart area defaults to 1-year view.

interaction_and_states.description: Choosing a different time range from the dropdown updates the chart dynamically to reflect that period.
Mouse hovering over chart lines reveals precise price and date tooltips.

resource_dependency.comparisonToolSchema: Database logic supporting side-by-side comparisons of multiple stocks' key metrics.
resource_dependency.multiStockSelectorComponent: UI element enabling addition/removal of stocks to compare.

function: Facilitate side-by-side comparison of multiple stocks’ performance and characteristics.
static_description: Side panel listing added stocks, each with a remove button. Main area displays a comparative table or overlayed charts showing metrics like price changes, P/E ratios, dividends.

interaction_and_states.description: Adding stocks via search populates the comparison panel. Removing a stock deletes it from the comparison view instantly.

resource_dependency.fileDownloadHandler: Server endpoint handling file creation and streaming to client browsers.

function: Permit downloading of completed reports in common digital formats.
static_description: Row of export buttons labeled with supported formats (exportFormatsList), positioned prominently after the report preview. Buttons styled in navy theme.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking an export button triggers generation of the report in that format and starts a browser download prompt.

resource_dependency.authDatabaseSchema: User accounts table with fields: user_id, email, password_hash, created_at, last_login. Sessions managed via JWT tokens.
resource_dependency.authenticationProvider: OAuth2-compatible identity provider or self-hosted auth solution.

function: Securely manage user logins and maintain personalized profiles.
static_description: Top-right corner contains login/logout links. Logged-in users see avatar and username. Profile page accessible from dropdown menu with settings and history.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Login' opens modal form. Successful login redirects to dashboard. Logout clears session and returns to homepage.

resource_dependency.watchlistDatabaseSchema: Table linking user_id to list of saved stock_ids with optional notes/tags.

function: Allow users to save favorite stocks for quick future access.
static_description: Bookmark icon next to each stock entry (bookmarkToggleIcon). When active, it appears filled; inactive version is outlined. Watchlist tab appears in user profile.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the bookmark icon adds/removes the stock from the user's watchlist. Visual feedback confirms the action immediately.

resource_dependency.newsFeedAPI: External API delivering relevant financial news articles tagged by stock symbol.
resource_dependency.relatedNewsSectionSchema: Database table associating stock_id with fetched article metadata (title, source, URL, publish_date).

function: Aggregate and present timely news related to searched stocks.
static_description: Collapsible news feed section beneath the main stock info, displaying headlines with source names and publication dates. Articles open in new tabs when clicked.

interaction_and_states.description: Expanding/collamicing the news section toggles visibility. Clicking individual articles navigates to original sources.
